attack.custom: for each friend, discard one card,lose -2 health

werewolf.title: Werewolf
werewolf.description: For each friend card, choose: -2 Health -or- discard one card
werewolf.rewardtext: All Choose, +2 Health, or draw card from discard pile

assassin.title: Assassin
assassin.description: When location influence added, all villians -1 damage
assassin.rewardtext: All gain +1 Ability, and remove location influence point

attack.custom: top card deck not starter, discard one, +1 location

hobgoblin.title: Hobgoblin
hobgoblin.description: If top card in deck cost > 1, then discard one card and add a location influence point
hobgoblin.rewardtext: All gain +1 Ability, and draw one card

ankheg.title: Ankheg
ankheg.rewardtext: All gain +1 Health, and remove location influence point

ogre.title: Ogre
ogre.description: For each spell in hand, -1 Health

attack.custom: for new monster or monster rally -2 health

centaur.title: Centaur

basilisk.title: Basilisk
basilisk.rewardtext: All hereos draw one card, and remove location influence point

demon1.title: Demon
